data.text: This is a message about Moab. The Commander of the armies of angels said:
No one will boast about Moab again;
Listen to the people of Horonaim town screaming;
All of Moab will be ruined;
They will cry bitterly
Someone will say to them, ‘Flee!
But you trusted that because you were rich and powerful, you would be safe;
All the towns in Moab will be destroyed;
Spread salt on the ground
Yahweh will curse anyone who will not eagerly do what he desires,
The people of Moab have always felt secure;
But Yahweh says that there will be a time when he will send enemies to attack them;
Then the people of Moab will be ashamed of their god/idol Chemosh because it did not help them,
The soldiers of Moab previously said, “We are warriors;
But now our King, who is Yahweh, who is called ‘the Commander of the armies of angels’, says that the country of Moab and all the towns in it will be destroyed.
Moab will very soon be destroyed.
You people who live in nations near Moab,
You people of Dibon city, stop being proud because of being honored,
You people of Aroer town,
They will reply,
Yahweh will have punished the towns in Moab that are on the ◄plateau/high level►:
Dibon and Nebo and Beth-Diblathaim,
Kiriathaim and Beth-Gamul and Beth-Meon,
Kerioth and Bozrah,
Yahweh says, “The power [MTY] of Moab will be ended;
You people of Moab have rebelled against me, Yahweh;
You people of Moab ridiculed the people of Israel [RHQ].
You people who live in Moab,
We have all heard that the people of Moab are very proud;
But Yahweh says, “I know about that,
So now I will wail for Moab;
You people of Sibmah city, you have many vineyards.
But no one will be joyful or happy in Moab now;
Instead, the sound of their wailing will rise from Heshbon city to Elealeh town and Jahaz village,
I, Yahweh, say that I will get rid of the people who offer sacrifices on the hilltops,
I [SYN] moan for the people of Moab and Kir-Hareseth
The men will shave their heads and their beards to show that they are mourning.
In every home and in the town plazas/centers in Moab there will be people who are mourning,
Moab will be completely shattered!
This is what I, Yahweh, say:
Its cities will be captured,
The leaders of Moab boasted against me, Yahweh,
I, Yahweh, say that you people of Moab will be terrified, and fall into pits and traps.
Those who are terrified and try to run away will fall into deep pits.
The people will flee as far as Heshbon city,
You people of Moab, terrible things will happen to you!
But some day, I will enable the people of Moab to return to their land again.
